info.title: ProgrammableConnectivity
info.description: Azure Programmable Connectivity Provider management API.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List Gateway resources by subscription ID.
List OperatorApiConnection resources by subscription ID.
List OperatorApiPlan resources by subscription ID.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An optional OData based filter expression to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: An optional query parameter which specifies the maximum number of records to be returned.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: An optional query parameter which specifies the number of records to be skipped.

get.description: Get an OperatorApiPlan resource by name.
List Gateway resources by resource group.
Get a Gateway resource by name.

put.description: Create or update an APC Gateway.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: operatorApiConnectionName
parameters.description: Azure Programmable Connectivity (APC) Operator API Connection Name.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

ApplicationOwnerProperties.description: Details about the Application Owner (i.e. organization) that would use the Operator's Network APIs.

name.description: Common name of the organization owning the application.

legalName.description: Legal name of the organization owning the application.

tradingName.description: Trading name of the organization owning the application.

organizationDescription.description: A description of the organization owning the application.

taxNumber.description: Unique Tax Number for the user's organization in the country/region the APC Gateway is being purchased.

organizationType.description: The type of organization that the Application Owner is.

organizationIdentificationId.description: ID number for official identification of the organization.

organizationIdentificationIssuer.description: Issuing organization of the ID for official identification of the organization.

organizationIdentificationType.description: Type of official identification of the organization.

contactEmailAddress.description: Email address for the person responsible for the use of Network APIs in this application.

privacyPolicyUrl.description: URL for the organization's privacy policy.

ApplicationProperties.description: Details about the Application that would use the Operator's Network APIs.

privacyPolicyUrl.description: URL for the organization's privacy policy.

Category.description: Valid values for category based on https://www.tmforum.org/oda/open-apis/directory/open-gateway-onboarding-and-ordering-component-suite-TMF931

Context.description: Valid values for the context based on W3C Data Privacy Vocabulary v2 https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/.

DataProcessing.description: Model defining how received data is processed.

processingOperation.description: The operation that is performed on the data received.

contexts.description: The contexts in which the data is processed.

duration.description: The duration or temporal limitation of the data processing.

frequency.description: The frequency of the data processing.

transitRegions.description: The countries/regions the data transits through.

storageRegions.description: The countries/regions the data is stored in.

DataRegions.description: Model defining the information required about the countries/regions the data transits through or is stored in.

countryCode.description: The country code of the country/region the data transits through or is stored in.

commercialOrganization.description: The commercial organization who is managing the data.

commercialActivity.description: Flag to indicate if commercial activity applies to this data management.

dataPrivacyFrameworkUrl.description: URL of the organization or governmental data privacy framework.

Duration.description: Valid values for the duration based on W3C Data Privacy Vocabulary v2 https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/.

Frequency.description: Valid values for the frequency based on W3C Data Privacy Vocabulary v2 https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

GatewayListResult.description: The response of a Gateway list operation.

value.description: The Gateway items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

operatorApiConnections.description: List of Operator API Connections selected by the user.

items.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

gatewayBaseUrl.description: Base URL of the Gateway resource. This is the URL that the users would use to make Network API requests to the Operators via Azure.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on the Gateway resource.

configuredApplication.description: Details about the Application that would use the Operator's Network APIs.

configuredApplicationOwner.description: Details about the Organization owning the Application that would use the Operator's Network APIs.

GatewayTagsUpdate.description: The type used for updating tags in Gateway resources.

LocalRepresentative.description: Model defining a local representative for a country/region.

countryCode.description: Country code for the country/region the local representative is representing.

MarketplaceProperties.description: Azure marketplace properties for a plan.

offerId.description: Azure marketplace Offer ID for this plan.

publisherId.description: Azure marketplace Publisher ID for this plan.

planId.description: Azure marketplace Plan ID for this plan.

OperatorApiConnection.description: A Programmable Connectivity Operator API Connection resource

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

OperatorApiConnectionListResult.description: The response of a OperatorApiConnection list operation.

value.description: The OperatorApiConnection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

OperatorApiConnectionProperties.description: Operator API Connection resource properties that cannot be updated once a resource has been created.

operatorApiPlanId.description: Reference to the Operator API Plan Resource ID.

marketplaceSaasProperties.description: Details about the SaaS offer purchased from the Azure Marketplace.

gatewayId.description: Reference to the APC Gateway resource ID.

operatorName.description: Name of the Operator in the linked Operator API Plan belongs to.

camaraApiName.description: The Network API for the current operator in the country/region provided in the linked Operator API Plan.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

status.description: The status of the OperatorApiConnection resource.

purposes.description: The purpose for which the Application will use the API. Max Items 1 currently as Operators do not support multiple.

purposeReason.description: Explanation of the reason that justifies the purpose: specifically why is the API used for the application's use case.

dataProcessingList.description: List of ways the data returned on this API is processed.

OperatorApiConnectionUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the OperatorApiConnection.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

OperatorApiConnectionUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the OperatorApiConnection.

operatorApiPlanId.description: Reference to the Operator API Plan Resource ID.

purposes.description: The purpose for which the Application will use the API. Max Items 1 currently as Operators do not support multiple.

purposeReason.description: Explanation of the reason that justifies the purpose: specifically why is the API used for the application's use case.

dataProcessingList.description: List of ways the data returned on this API is processed.

OperatorApiPlan.description: A Programmable Connectivity Operator API Plans resource. This is a readonly resource that indicates which Operator Network APIs are available in the user's subscription.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

OperatorApiPlanListResult.description: The response of a OperatorApiPlan list operation.

value.description: The OperatorApiPlan items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

operatorName.description: Name of the Operator this plan belongs to.

camaraApiName.description: Standardized Network API name defined by CAMARA specifications.

supportedLocations.description: List of Azure regions where this offer is supported.

operatorRegions.description: List of country/region names where this plan is being supported by the Operator.

markets.description: List of country/region names where this plan is being supported by Azure Marketplace.

limits.description: The limits, if any, will be imposed by the operator.

marketplaceProperties.description: Azure marketplace properties for this plan.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation on the Gateway resource.

OrganizationType.description: Valid values for the Organization Type based on W3C Data Privacy Vocabulary v2 https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/.

familyName.description: Family name of the contactable person.

givenName.description: Given name of the contactable person.

emailAddress.description: Email address of the contactable person.

ProcessingOperation.description: Valid values for the processing operation based on W3C Data Privacy Vocabulary v2 https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/.

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of a resource.

values.name: Accepted
values.description: The resource create or update request has been accepted

Purpose.description: Valid values for the purpose based on W3C Data Privacy Vocabulary v2 https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/.

SaasProperties.description: Details about the SaaS offer purchased from the marketplace.

saasSubscriptionId.description: Subscription ID of the SaaS offer purchased from the marketplace.

saasResourceId.description: Resource ID of the SaaS offer purchased from the marketplace.

Status.description: Description of the current status of the OperatorApiConnection resource.

state.description: Current state of the OperatorApiConnection resource.

reason.description: Explanation of the current state of the OperatorApiConnection resource.
